desc: Atlanta local honey. Honey Next Door keeps bees in local Atlanta neighborhoods to provide hyperlocal honey products and to keep a healthy population of honeybees in the urban ecosystem. We own and manage beehives in Buckhead, Candler Park, Oakhurst, Druid Hills, Inman Park, Virginia Highlands and other neighborhoods.

layout.text: Candles made from 100% pure beeswax are cleaner than artificial
